00061 bool CHPFileConverter::ConvertFile(const char *fileName, const char *libPath, CHPFileVersionType fileVersion)
00062 {
00063         return ConvertFile(fileName, libPath, NULL, NULL, fileVersion, true);
00064 }
00065 /*
00066  * Convert the file.
00067  */
00068 bool CHPFileConverter::ConvertFile(const char *fileName, 
00069                                                                                                                                          const char *libPath, 
00070                                                                                                                                          const char *celFile, 
00071                                                                                                                                          const char *maskPath, 
00072                                                                                                                                          CHPFileVersionType fileVersion, 
00073                                                                                                                                          bool removeBackup)
00074 {
00075         Clear();
00076 
00077         // Check if the file exists
00078         if (ConverterFileExists(fileName) == false)
00079         {
00080                 errorCode = FileDoesNotExist;
00081                 return false;
00082         }
00083 
00084         // Determine the format
00085         CHPFileVersionType inVersion = CHPFileVersion::DetermineCHPFileVersion(fileName);
00086 
00087         // If unknown the return a false.
00088         if (inVersion == Unknown_Version)
00089         {
00090                 errorCode = InvalidChpFileFormat;
00091                 return false;
00092         }
00093 
00094         // If same then don't do anything, the file is already of that format.
00095         if (inVersion == fileVersion)
00096         {
00097                 return true;
00098         }
00099 
00100         // Move the input file name to a backup.
00101         string bakSuffix = ".bak";
00102         string bakFile = fileName + bakSuffix;
00103         if (ConverterMoveFile(fileName, bakFile.c_str(), true) == false)
00104         {
00105                 errorCode = UnableToRenameInputFile;
00106                 return false;
00107         }
00108 
00109         // Convert the file.
00110         bool status = false;
00111         if (fileVersion == GCOS_XDA_Version && inVersion == Calvin_Version1)
00112         {
00113                 CHPFileConvertToXDA outFile;
00114                 status = outFile.ConvertCalvinFile(bakFile.c_str(), fileName);
00115                 errorCode = outFile.ErrorCode();
00116         }
00117         else if (fileVersion == Calvin_Version1 && inVersion == GCOS_XDA_Version)
00118         {
00119                 CHPFileConvertToCalvin outFile;
00120                 status = outFile.ConvertXDAFile(bakFile.c_str(), libPath, fileName);
00121                 errorCode = outFile.ErrorCode();
00122         }
00123         else if(fileVersion == Calvin_Version1 && inVersion == GCOS_Mas5_Version && celFile != NULL)
00124         {
00125                 CHPFileConvertToCalvin outFile;
00126                 status = outFile.ConvertMas5File(bakFile.c_str(), celFile, libPath, maskPath, fileName);
00127                 errorCode = outFile.ErrorCode();
00128         }
00129         else
00130         {
00131                 errorCode = InvalidConversionInputs;
00132                 status = false;
00133         }
00134 
00135         // Check the status and revert if needed.
00136         if (status == false)
00137         {
00138                 ConverterMoveFile(bakFile.c_str(), fileName, true);
00139         }
00140         else if(removeBackup)
00141         {
00142                 ConverterRemoveFile(bakFile.c_str());
00143         }
00144         return status;
00145 }
